quotes.message: The people who influence you are the people who believe in you.
quotes.author: Henry Drummond

quotes.message: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: Aim for the moon. If you miss, you may hit a star.
quotes.author: W.Clement Stone

quotes.message: Happines is not by chance, but by choice
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.message: The question isnt who is going to let me; its who is going to stop me.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.message: Action may not always bring happiness; but there is no happiness without action
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.message: Tell me and I forget. Teach me and I remember. Involve me and I learn.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: What would you do if you knew you could not fail?
quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.message: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince (Harry Potter  #6)
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling-Mary GrandPré

quotes.message: If you can't explain it simply, you don't understand it well enough.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: Yesterday is not ours to recover, but tomorrow is ours to win or lose.
quotes.author: Lyndon B. Johnson

quotes.message: Logic will get you from A to B. Imagination will take you everywhere.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: Believe you can and you’re halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.message: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince (Harry Potter  #6)
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling-Mary GrandPré

quotes.message: Everything you have ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
quotes.author: George Addair

quotes.message: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
quotes.author: Mahatma Ghandi

quotes.message: A negative mind will never give you a positive life
quotes.author: Theodore Rosevelt
